title: Stuck at honour 3
body: I have been honour 3 forever now, and I don't understand how I'm not at least honour level 4 yet.  I usually get around 2-3 honours each game, varying between each game of course but generally I maintain a stable income of honours each day.  Yet I am still an honour 3 which is very confusing to me.  Can someone explain why this is?

replies.body: Everyone's going to rank up their honor at a different rate simply due to playing games at different paces and playing a different amount of games. With that being said, it does look like there was some borderline punishable behavior. Even though you weren't immediately punished for it, that could be holding a bit of weight on your current honor gains.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=09iZyXaf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-20T04:31:19.591+0000)
>
> Everyone's going to rank up their honor at a different rate simply due to playing games at different paces and playing a different amount of games. With that being said, it does look like there was some borderline punishable behavior. Even though you weren't immediately punished for it, that could be holding a bit of weight on your current honor gains.

Its been almost a year since I've received even a chat restriction so I didn't expect that to matter.  Will this progress into the next season?

Little clarification, I wasn't talking about your past chat restriction but behavior that *wasn't* actively punished. Some games showed certain borderline behavior that wasn't bad enough to give you a chat restriction or any type of suspension or ban. Instead, it looks like your honor progress was slowed due to borderline punishable behavior. Instead of getting some type of punishment, your honor progress was slowed a bit.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=09iZyXaf,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-20T05:49:22.442+0000)
>
> Little clarification, I wasn't talking about your past chat restriction but behavior that *wasn't* actively punished. Some games showed certain borderline behavior that wasn't bad enough to give you a chat restriction or any type of suspension or ban. Instead, it looks like your honor progress was slowed due to borderline punishable behavior. Instead of getting some type of punishment, your honor progress was slowed a bit.

so I'm being punished but have not been given any proof of my behaviour.  Can I contact player support asking for chat logs?

Absolutely! We don't like to delve too depth into chat logs and such here on the boards since it kinda puts a spotlight on ya, but the player behavior team is always open to talking about those things with you in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
